files.name: README.md
files.content: ## Introduction Orion for Laravel allows you to build a fully featured REST API based on your Eloquent models and relationships with simplicity of Laravel as you love it. ## Documentation Documentation can be found on the [website](https://orion.tailflow.org). ## Supported By ## License The Laravel Orion is open-source software licensed under the [MIT license](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT).

files.name: composer.json
phpunit.xml.dist
files.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<phpunit backupGlobals="false"
         backupStaticAttributes="false"
         beStrictAboutTestsThatDoNotTestAnything="false"
         bootstrap="vendor/autoload.php"
         colors="true"
         convertErrorsToExceptions="true"
         convertNoticesToExceptions="true"
         convertWarningsToExceptions="true"
         processIsolation="false"
         stopOnFailure="false"
>
    <php>
        <env name="APP_KEY" value="testing"/>
    </php>
    <filter>
        <whitelist processUncoveredFilesFromWhitelist="true">
            <directory suffix=".php">./src</directory>
        </whitelist>
    </filter>
    <testsuites>
        <testsuite name="Package Test Suite">
            <directory suffix="Test.php">./tests</directory>
        </testsuite>
    </testsuites>
</phpunit>
